comments.author: CryptoBuds
comments.body: It's just your feeling and you're a newbie, you don't know anything about bitcoin yet so please don't judge what you don't know. You should take the time to learn more about Bitcoin, because once you have a better understanding of it you will be able to decide whether to invest in bitcoin or NFT.
